page.title: 09Problems in Darfield
page.content: Our biggest problem in Darfield is graffiti. There is a lot of graffiti because there is little for teenagers to do. There is a shopping centre which is not used a lot. There might be less graffiti if it was made into a youth club or sports centre. Apart from that there are no really significant problems in our village. We only have a few criminals and most of the crimes are break-ins. P.C. Boocock,our community policeman is afraid that in the future there will be more. Another problem is the closure of Darfield Main Colliery. There will be a lot of people without jobs. I do not think we have much of a health problem in Darfield. The biggest worries are diseases associated with smoking and obesity.
